text: Are you using the programmable email beta?
Cool thanks man, that works. Does that also mean I can add JavaScript in email modules now?
Nope, its still just html and HubL, Javascript doesn’t work in email clients

Hey! Anyone knows if it’s possible that a user can choose the frequency in which they want to receive emails from a client in HubSpot. I mean an option like this:

*I want to receive newsletters:*
• Once a week
• Twice a week
• Once a Month.
I searched for this without luck.
Thanks
You can set up a landing page with a form, that has a contact property to record frequency. Then use that property to create active lists, that can be used to segment the email sends.
Courtney, thanks for that info. I am studying the “Subscription Preferences” module to see if that can help too!
